2:
Yahweh has made known his salvation;\q he has openly showed his justice to all the nations.


\q
3:
He calls to mind his covenant loyalty and faithfulness for the house of Israel;\q all the ends of the earth will see the victory of our God.
\q
4:
Shout for joy to Yahweh, all the earth;\q burst into song, sing for joy, and sing praises.


\q
5:
Sing praises to Yahweh with the harp,\q with the harp and melodious song.
\q
6:
With trumpets and the sound of the horn,\q make a joyful noise before the King, Yahweh.


\q
7:
Let the sea shout and everything in it,\q the world and those who live in it!
\q
8:
Let the rivers clap their hands,\q and let the mountains shout for joy.
\q
9:
Yahweh is coming to judge the earth;\q he will judge the world with righteousness
\q and the nations with fairness.
